author: fivedogit
content: Subject change: how feasible would it be to add a property to addresses called something like  lastTouched, lastUsed or lastSent that would return a block number the last time a tx was successfully sent by the address?

author: fivedogit
content: In voting systems, it would be nice to be able to exclude or otherwise handle differently accounts that appear dead (haven't had any activity in X blocks)

author: fivedogit
content: Currently it's difficult to know what a quorum is in a group bc of the possibility of dead accounts. Maybe there are other good use cases for such information being available inside smart contracts?

author: fivedogit
content: Is this a total non-starter? If so, why?
